languages.text: "Угроза 3Т, генокрады. Шпионы враждебной ксенорасы, засланные в Империум. Я как можно скорее сообщу о них Лорд-инквизитору. Такую угрозу не стоит недооценивать, как и их психический потенциал. Теперь, когда они не прячутся, я слышу их мерзкие ментальные кличи с неприятной ясностью".

"Menace 3T, the Genestealers. Spies of a hostile xenos race sent to infiltrate the Imperium. I will report this to the Lord Inquisitor the first chance I get. To underestimate this threat or its psychic potential would be folly. Now that they are no longer hiding, I can hear their disgusting mental cries with disturbing clarity."
languages.original_text: "Угроза 3Т, генокрады. Шпионы враждебной ксенорасы, засланные в Империум. Я как можно скорее сообщу о них Лорд-инквизитору. Такую угрозу не стоит недооценивать, как и их психический потенциал. Теперь, когда они не прячутся, я слышу их мерзкие ментальные кличи с неприятной ясностью".

languages.text: « Menace 3T : les Genestealers. Des espions envoyés par une race de xénos hostiles pour infiltrer l'Imperium. J'en informerai le seigneur inquisiteur à la première occasion. Sous-estimer cette menace ou son potentiel psychique serait une grave erreur. Maintenant qu'ils ont tombé le masque, je perçois leurs répugnants appels mentaux avec une clarté troublante. »
languages.original_text: "Menace 3T, the Genestealers. Spies of a hostile xenos race sent to infiltrate the Imperium. I will report this to the Lord Inquisitor the first chance I get. To underestimate this threat or its psychic potential would be folly. Now that they are no longer hiding, I can hear their disgusting mental cries with disturbing clarity."

traits.locale_text: « Menace 3T : les Genestealers. Des espions envoyés par une race de xénos hostiles pour infiltrer l'Imperium. J'en informerai le seigneur inquisiteur à la première occasion. Sous-estimer cette menace ou son potentiel psychique serait une grave erreur. Maintenant qu'ils ont tombé le masque, je perçois leurs répugnants appels mentaux avec une clarté troublante. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “威胁代号3T，基因窃取者。它们是敌对异形势力派来的间谍，目的是渗透到帝国内部。我会第一时间向大审判官报告。如果低估了它们的威胁与灵能力量，那恐怕就太愚蠢了。如今，它们已经不再躲藏，我已经清楚地听到了它们扰人心神的灵能尖叫。”
languages.original_text: "Menace 3T, the Genestealers. Spies of a hostile xenos race sent to infiltrate the Imperium. I will report this to the Lord Inquisitor the first chance I get. To underestimate this threat or its psychic potential would be folly. Now that they are no longer hiding, I can hear their disgusting mental cries with disturbing clarity."

traits.locale_text: “威胁代号3T，基因窃取者。它们是敌对异形势力派来的间谍，目的是渗透到帝国内部。我会第一时间向审判长报告。如果低估了它们的威胁与灵能力量，那恐怕就太愚蠢了。如今，它们已经不再躲藏，我已经清楚地听到了它们扰人心神的灵能尖叫。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Gefahr 3T, die Symbionten. Spione einer feindlichen Xenosspezies, die geschickt wurden, um das Imperium zu infiltrieren. Ich werde das bei nächster Gelegenheit dem Großinquisitor melden. Es wäre töricht, diese Gefahr oder ihr psychisches Potenzial zu unterschätzen. Jetzt, wo sie sich nicht länger verbergen, kann ich ihre widerwärtigen mentalen Schreie mit verstörender Klarheit hören."
languages.original_text: "Menace 3T, the Genestealers. Spies of a hostile xenos race sent to infiltrate the Imperium. I will report this to the Lord Inquisitor the first chance I get. To underestimate this threat or its psychic potential would be folly. Now that they are no longer hiding, I can hear their disgusting mental cries with disturbing clarity."

traits.locale_text: "Gefahr 3T, die Symbionten. Spione einer feindlichen Xenosspezies, die geschickt wurden, um das Imperium zu infiltrieren. Jetzt, wo sie sich nicht länger verbergen, kann ich ihre widerwärtigen mentalen Schreie mit verstörender Klarheit hören."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Amenaza 3T, los Genestealers. Espías de una raza hostil de xenos con la misión de infiltrarse en el Imperium. Avisaré a{mf|l| la} Lord Inquisidor de esto en cuanto pueda. No deberíamos pasar por alto esta amenaza ni el poder psíquico de estos enemigos. Ahora que ya no se esconden, puedo escuchar sus desagradables gritos mentales con total claridad».
languages.original_text: "Menace 3T, the Genestealers. Spies of a hostile xenos race sent to infiltrate the Imperium. I will report this to the Lord Inquisitor the first chance I get. To underestimate this threat or its psychic potential would be folly. Now that they are no longer hiding, I can hear their disgusting mental cries with disturbing clarity."

traits.locale_text: «Amenaza 3T, los Genestealers. Espías de una raza hostil de xenos con la misión de infiltrarse en el Imperium. Avisaré a{mf|l| la} Lord Inquisidor de esto en cuanto pueda. No deberíamos pasar por alto esta amenaza ni el poder psíquico de estos enemigos. Ahora que ya no se esconden, puedo escuchar sus desagradables gritos mentales con total claridad».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ジーンスティーラー、メナス3T。帝国潜入を目的に送り込まれた好戦的な異種族のスパイか。機会ができたらすぐロード・インクィジターに報告しよう。この脅威やその超能力の危険性を甘く見ればバカを見る。もう奴らは、どこにも潜んでいないな。近くにいれば、奴らの精神に響く嫌な叫び声が、気が狂いそうなほどハッキリ聞こえるからな」
languages.original_text: "Menace 3T, the Genestealers. Spies of a hostile xenos race sent to infiltrate the Imperium. I will report this to the Lord Inquisitor the first chance I get. To underestimate this threat or its psychic potential would be folly. Now that they are no longer hiding, I can hear their disgusting mental cries with disturbing clarity."

traits.locale_text: 「ジーンスティーラー、メナス3T。帝国潜入を目的に送り込まれた好戦的な異種族のスパイか。機会ができたらすぐロード・インクィジターに報告しよう。この脅威やその超能力の危険性を甘く見ればバカを見る。もう奴らは、どこにも潜んでいないな。近くにいれば、奴らの精神に響く嫌な叫び声が、気が狂いそうなほどハッキリ聞こえるからな」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "3. kademe bir tehdit. Gençalanlar. İmparatorluk'a sızmaları için düşman bir zeno ırkı tarafından gönderilen casuslar. Bunu ilk fırsatta Lord Engizisyoncu'ya raporlayacağım. Bu tehdidi ve onun ruhsezi potansiyelini küçümsemek akılsızlık olur. Artık saklanıyorlar, mide bulandırıcı zihinsel çığlıklarını rahatsızlık verici bir netlikte duyabiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Menace 3T, the Genestealers. Spies of a hostile xenos race sent to infiltrate the Imperium. I will report this to the Lord Inquisitor the first chance I get. To underestimate this threat or its psychic potential would be folly. Now that they are no longer hiding, I can hear their disgusting mental cries with disturbing clarity."
